155111222111.content:
"Good Morning to you, Miss Elesa. I'm Mr.Kola with but a small request for you..." Came the voice of a man from the receiver. Given her line of work, Elesa was well aware when . Giving her vacation a possible kiss goodbye, the shining beauty prepped herself for whatever this man would offer her. "We've just recently came up with a new line of soft drink for production and well, we were wondering if Nimbasa's own Shining Beauty would like to star in our first advertisement." It wasn't uncommon for Elesa to be a target of companies for their commercials. After all, with someone as famous as her endorsing products, sales would skyrocket simply because of Elesa's word of "buy this". Fashion labels were perhaps the most common seekers for Elesa's services to model with their clothing and such but, food and beverages were a rarity.

"Hmm...while the offer is promising. I'd like to know more about this soft drink, Mr. Kola." Elesa replied, walking over to one of the many comfortable chairs in her den and parking her perky, towel-clad rear into it' softened seat. "If it's not too much trouble, of course. This is the first time I'm hearing of this new soft drink. Me being in tune with the latest trends and setting them myself, I'm a little surprised this slipped under my radar."

"Ah hah, say no more, Miss Elesa. I understand completely." The man chuckled, a rustling of papers being heard through the phone as he appeared to be rummaging through something for a moment. "Our soft drink is the first in, what we hope to be, a long line of Berry Sodas. This product combines the well-rounded flavor of the Sitrus Berry and combines it with the fizzy goodness of Soda Pop and while we ourselves found the taste remarkable, we'd need some help from you to assure our customers that even the electrifying model herself loves our drinks." Elesa paused as the soda selling man continued on with his lyrical description of his soft drink, the model rubbing her dainty fingers along her chin as she considered her options. Her vacation had just started today and she was looking forward to finally unwinding from the jam-packed schedule of being both a super-model and a gym leader. Her peaceful week was being disrupted by a man and his little soda full of Sitrus Berries, but...on the other hand, perhaps this will be the only call she gets for most of the week? Commercials never take long to shoot and, once her manager smooths out details with Mr.Kola, the filming process will only take one, maybe two, takes and then she's free for the day. At the most, this job will be done in a day or two, depending on the preference of her client and even then, most of her week will largely be intact and open for her to enjoy at her leisure.

"Well then...I believe that's everything..." Mr. Kola sighed with a fatigue from his long-winded speech that, the model wasn't even listening to. Elesa did feel a little bad for having him taper on like that but, she at least had time to mull over her decision to keep this call short and smooth. "I get rather ...long-winded when discussing my products. So, I'd like to apologize if I took up too much time out of your busy schedule." Elesa gave a sly look in silence. "Anywhom, you would be doing us a huge favor if you'd star in our commercial. I'll make sure you're compensated handsomely for your cooperation if you decide to help us out. That said, will you accept my offer, Miss Elesa...?"
